fullplot: The pediatrician Alexandre Beck misses his beloved wife Margot Beck, who was brutally murdered eight years ago when he was the prime suspect. When two bodies are found near where the corpse of Margot was dumped, the police reopen the case and Alex becomes suspect again. The mystery increases when Alex receives an e-mail showing Margot older and alive.

title: Tell No One

tomatoes.consensus: An intense, well-crafted thriller, Tell No One is equal parts heart-pounding and heart-wrenching.
